item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-6 Chances: Lyft’s estimated fair value is US$35.37 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity Shares of ride sharing service Lyft (NASDAQ: LYFT) jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after major indices rose Risks: Lyft shares more than doubled over the last year, but the stock underperformed when compared with Uber The future of Uber and Lyft in Minneapolis has garnered concern and debate due to new regulations Score:-6 chances characters count - risks characters count = -6
